items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like a glove
items.body: Im 200lbs 5’5” and bought the large. I carry my weight in my breasts and belly. This fit very flatteringly. Read more
items.author: Margaret Watson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect dress
items.body: The dress fit perfect I love it Read more
items.author: Marion Allen

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars not made for smaller sizes
items.body: Do not buy this if you are petite. I am swimming in the extra small. For reference i’m 5ft and wear 23in waist in jeans/pants. Certainly does not fit snug like the photo shows. There is not one part of this dress that fits correctly. It’s loose and frumpy everywhere. Read more
items.author: emilee lantagne

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too big, even for me.
items.body: This is a quality dress, however, I am normally a 2xl bc of my chest. This dress was oversized on me in the shoulders, arms and overall length. I will size down. Great material- thick and perfect for the season. 5’4” 220lb 38G Read more
items.author: Augusta Anderson

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Some might like it but to me, it felt too 'spandex like'
items.body: The dress is a bit thicker, which is appropriate for colder seasons. However, all of it is a very spandex material. Read more
items.author: Kelsey Wing

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Red, Brown, Pink, White, Apricot, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
